thread.title: Healthy in New York? A rare gem
thread.title_full: Healthy in New York? A rare gem - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: GetPitted949
title: Healthy in New York? A rare gem
text: I'm a road warrior, a lifestyle replete with bad beds, lousy food, and few gyms (let alone en suite physical therapy gear, which is great help unwinding from the bad seats on airplanes and rental cars). This place, however, is a ray of light in the darkness of the road. Love the concept. The staff was friendly in a way that you don't find in New York. Good vibe, down to earth, actually helpful people. And you can't beat the location. `Highly recommend it.
